title: 1.16的指令萌新发出的提问
author: 水艹
txt_content:
本人是指令萌新1.13+的版本指令大改变

想问下
当场上冒险模式的玩家只剩一人是就激活某项指令
并且现实大标题title @a title "XX玩家胜利"的指令怎么做
在线等，急！
求大老直接打指令

replies.author: Jokey_钥匙
replies.txt_content:
洞穴夜莺 发表于 2020-8-21 16:22
去除积分项可的太棒了(
初始化scoreboard objectives add player_count dummy
以下循环
execute store result score player_count player_count if entity @a[gamemode=adventure]
execute if score player_count player_count matches 1 run title @a title [{"selector": "@p[gamemode=adventure]"}, "胜利"]

replies.author: 洞穴夜莺
replies.txt_content:
scoreboard objectives add player_count dummy
scoreboard players set player_count player_count 0
execute as @a[gamemode=adventure] run scoreboard players add player_count player_count 1
execute if score player_count player_count matches 1 run title @a title [{"selector": "@p[gamemode=adventure]"}, "胜利"]
scoreboard objectives remove player_count复制代码

replies.author: 洞穴夜莺
replies.txt_content:
Jokey_钥匙 发表于 2020-8-21 20:32
去除积分项可的太棒了(
初始化scoreboard objectives add player_count dummy
以下循环

去不去除无所谓的

replies.author: 水艹
replies.txt_content:
洞穴夜莺 发表于 2020-8-21 16:22
那如果我还要把所有玩家传送到大厅呢
